thread.title: This Sleepy IPO Market Could Have a Big Year

author: Yantoultra Ngui
title: This Sleepy IPO Market Could Have a Big Year

organizations.name: asian bond markets barely blink after u.s. treasury

text: Malaysia’s IPO market is stirring after a long slumber. Several foreign and state-owned companies are planning billion-dollar stock offerings on the Southeast Asian country’s bourse this year, riding its strengthening currency and economic growth, along with improving fund flows. A telecommunication tower unit of Malaysia’s largest mobile-phone operator Axiata Group Bhd. is talking to local Asian Bond Markets Barely Blink After U.S. Treasury Yields Hit 3% Next WSJ City: Credit Suisse Beats Expectations, Takeda-Shire Deal Inches Closer
